mapper.sql: select id, apply_type, apply_user, apply_time, backup_id, backup_time, backup_status, flow_id, flow_step, review_user, remark, deleted, create_time, create_by, update_time from bakss_apply
mapper.select: from bakss_apply a, bakss_apply_flow b where a.flow_id = b.flow_id and b.review_status = 0 and b.flow_step ='dba'
from bakss_apply a, bakss_apply_flow b where a.flow_id = b.flow_id and b.review_status = 0 and b.flow_step ='admin'
from bakss_apply a, bakss_apply_flow b where a.flow_id = b.flow_id and b.review_status = 0 and b.flow_step ='dbaLeader'
from bakss_apply a, bakss_apply_flow b, bakss_apply_backup_owner c where a.flow_id = b.flow_id and b.review_status = 0 and b.flow_step ='owner' and a.id = c.apply_id and c.old_user = #{owner}
from bakss_apply a, bakss_apply_flow b, bakss_apply_backup_permis c where a.flow_id = b.flow_id and b.review_status = 0 and b.flow_step ='assign' and a.id = c.apply_id and c.grant_user = #{user}
from bakss_apply a, bakss_apply_flow b where a.flow_id = b.flow_id and b.review_status = 0
from bakss_apply a, bakss_apply_flow b where a.flow_id = b.flow_id and b.review_status = 1
